title: Obsidian Water Walking Boots
summaries: Obsidian Water Walking Boots are an accessory which combines the abilities of the Water Walking Boots and the Obsidian Skull. They allow the wearer to walk on water and honey, and give immunity to the burning debuff. They do not allow walking on lava.

statistics.Tooltip:
Provides the ability to walk on water & honey
Grants immunity to fire blocks
statistics.Sell: 6
